com.umeng.socialize.media

Class SimpleShareContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.umeng.socialize.media.SimpleShareContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable, UMediaObject, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseShareContent

    public abstract class SimpleShareContent
extends Object
implements UMediaObject
    平台独立的简单分享内容，包含文字和多媒体分享内容.
    Version:
    V1.0
    Author:
    Honghui He
